configurePair(address,uint256).notice: Configures existing values of an AMM pair

consult(address,address,uint256).notice: General consult function, gets a value for _amountIn

consultKrAsset(address,uint256).notice: Get the AMM price for an amount of krAsset

initPair(address,address,uint256).notice: Initializes an AMM pair to the oracle

update(address).notice: Updates the oracle values for a pair
